full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Reefer Panels for Maritime Shipping Containers

#### Reference Information

- **Reference Number:** WS3297523754-Doc3910248356
- **Solicitation Number:** WS3297523754
- **Notice Published Date:** March 14, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date & Time:** April 5, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EDT

#### Procurement Requirements

Public Services Procurement Canada, on behalf of Natural Resources Canada, is seeking to acquire two (2) refrigerator wall panels compatible with standard refrigerated marine shipping containers. The panels must be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario.

#### Technical Specifications

- **UNSPSC Code:** 24110000 - Containers and Storage
- **Description:** Refrigerator wall panels for standard refrigerated marine shipping containers

#### Procurement Method and Selection Criteria

- **Method:** Competitive - Traditional
- **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreements

- **Applicable Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contracting Entity Information

- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### End User Entities Information

- **End User Entity:** Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
- **End User Entity Address:** 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E4, Canada

#### Contact Information

- **Contact Person:** Mcgowan, Theresa (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Contact Email:** theresa.mcgowan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Attachment Information

No attachments are available for this notice.

#### Notice URL

No notice URL is provided for this notice. For further information, please contact Theresa Mcgowan.

#### Important Dates

- **Tender Closing Date & Time:** April 5, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EDT

#### Late Bid Instructions

Please note that all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2:00 p.m. EDT. All bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.
